LanguageData.PolarisLyraeCurer.label: lyrae curer
LanguageData.PolarisLyraeCurer.description: The lyrae curer will tend wounds to nearby creatures but the quality won't be good.
LanguageData.PolarisLyraeCurer_Blueprint.label: lyrae curer (blueprint)
LanguageData.PolarisLyraeCurer_Frame.label: lyrae curer (building)
LanguageData.PolarisLyraeCurer_Frame.description: The lyrae curer will tend wounds to nearby creatures but the quality won't be good.
LanguageData.PolarisShipReactor.label: Mechanoid ship reactor
LanguageData.PolarisThermostat.label: thermostat
LanguageData.PolarisThermostat.description: A device that can control the temperature near the target value.
LanguageData.PolarisThermostat_Blueprint.label: thermostat (blueprint)
LanguageData.PolarisThermostat_Frame.label: thermostat (building)
LanguageData.PolarisThermostat_Frame.description: A device that can control the temperature near the target value.
LanguageData.PolarisMendingShelf.label: mending shelf
LanguageData.PolarisMendingShelf.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this won't deteriorate, even if outside. In addition, the items will be mended if it has fuel.
LanguageData.PolarisMendingShelf_Blueprint.label: mending shelf (blueprint)
LanguageData.PolarisMendingShelf_Frame.label: mending shelf (building)
LanguageData.PolarisMendingShelf_Frame.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this won't deteriorate, even if outside. In addition, the items will be mended if it has fuel.
